website_summaries.verdict: These gloves offer full coverage for the fingers, unlike most other bike gloves.
pros: Mimics the fit and comfort of adult cycling gloves
Just enough padding to reduce impact without compromising grip
Helps keep little fingers warm in cooler temperatures but still breathable enough for warmer days
Soft thumb material for wiping running noses
cons: Full-coverage finger design does not offer as much padding as fingerless style

customer_reviews.title: Love them, but wish they had grip
customer_reviews.text: They're adorable. My 2.5 year old has a strider bike and I wanted something for him to wear in the cooler months so his hands wouldn't freeze off. They're so cute and my son loves the little aliens on them. Glad I got them- I am giving 4 stars instead of 5 because I wish they had a grip on the under side of the gloves so their hands wouldn't slip off handle bars etc.
customer_reviews.author: Heather

customer_reviews.title: Great option for little kids
customer_reviews.text: Per recommendation to buy a size up, I purchase size "little kids medium 3-4 yr old" for my 2.8 year old. They are a little big on him which is correct considering he isn't 3 yet but aren't too much bigger to be an issue. I think he'll grow into them nicely. They look like adult gloves, seem to have a durable palm, nice graphics on the back, velcro wrist strap. Nice looking gloves that come in small sizes which were difficult to find
customer_reviews.author: Gary L. Richter Jr.

customer_reviews.title: High quality and comfortable gloves
customer_reviews.text: My 3 1/2 year old nephew got his first bike for Christmas, so I ordered the size 3-4 for him and they literally ‘fit like glove’! The gloves have some stretch to them so I have a few months until he grows out of them. I am going to buy these again for him.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah L

customer_reviews.title: Using to prevent thumb sucking
customer_reviews.text: Bought the smallest size for me 18mo old. They fit great and he isn’t taking them off. He has been wearing them almost all day everyday for almost a week now and while it’s obvious that they’ve been worn they don’t have any damage. One tricky thing is that it’s difficult to get a tiny hand into them especially when they won’t straighten the fingers for you.
customer_reviews.author: Frenchy

customer_reviews.title: love them perfect for preventing thumb sunking
customer_reviews.text: The gloves are perfect in size and to prevent my genious son to sunk the thumb. We had tried apple cider, spicy sauce, nail polish with bitter taste, stop thumb sucking thumbuster and Nip It the hand stopper. All fail because my son always after a day or two would always figure out how to sunk the finger again. This gloves are good in preventing my son to try to take the gloves off and it is also doesn't interfere with his everyday activities. The only time the gloves are taking off at school is to wash his hand before eating.
customer_reviews.author: Samuel

customer_reviews.title: Good size for toddler/young child
customer_reviews.text: We bought these for my daughter for spring soccer since it’s still cold during that time. She loves them and thinks they are cute. Fit good and Velcro great to her size around the wrist.
customer_reviews.author: Jamie

customer_reviews.title: Cute design but got a better fit with Giro DND II Jr gloves.
customer_reviews.text: I bought 3 kinds of gloves because gloves are required in Martial Arts. These didn't fit my kids' fingers very well, some were too long. We ended up getting a better fit with Giro DND II Jr youth gloves. These were easy to get on though.
customer_reviews.author: Kris B

customer_reviews.title: These are awesome, they do take some effort to get on ...
customer_reviews.text: These are awesome, they do take some effort to get on but that was expected. My child is 18months and active, she needed something that would give her hands some protection in chilli weather and would allow her to grip balls, sticks, ect., these are it, they are very cute too.
customer_reviews.author: Carl

customer_reviews.title: Best Toddler Glove Out There - Hands Down
customer_reviews.text: Anyone with a toddler can appreciate how hard it is to find gloves that actually fit your little one let alone meet the same level of quality and features as an adult glove. I was amazed when we took these full finger gloves out of the package and got them on our guy. Fit our 4 year old perfect and quite honestly can’t imagine a better product out there. Well done ZippyRooz A+++. These gloves were purchased and not sent to us as part of some free product if you test it thing....FYI
customer_reviews.author: Andrew

customer_reviews.title: Good quality, decent fit for 3 year old
customer_reviews.text: We have these gloves for my older son and they have lasted well so bought a new pair for our 3 year old who is now riding his bike more and scraped a hand recently. These are still great quality, the fit is a little off in finger length, but I am hoping this means he will grow into them over the next year
customer_reviews.author: Georgina Kennedy

customer_reviews.title: Perfect fit and quality
customer_reviews.text: These gloves are great for my 3 year old son. We ordered a medium after measuring his hands and initially thought they would be too small. The are perfect and still have a little room to grow without being big. They offer protection from scrapes when he falls from his bike. Not to mention he feels pretty cool wearing them.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Thompson

customer_reviews.title: Love these
customer_reviews.text: I never write reviews. But the pics of these gloves dont do them any justice. THey are much more cute in person. They have grips on the fingers to help them use the brake, and they are so great. I love them. I didnt like how they looked on line but my husband did research and these were the best, and they fit great and they are adorable and protect their hands. Very satisfied. Quality is great, and they are really great gloves! Thank you,
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fully functional, really colorful and comfortable gloves!
customer_reviews.text: I got these gloves for my 2 year old grandson so he could ride his 4 wheeled “scooter”. 2 years later he still wants to ride and wants the same “slamming” gloves. So I got the next size up and they, once again, fit great! They’re so cute and functional!!! Great purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Deanna

customer_reviews.title: Rad gloves for gettin shreddy
customer_reviews.text: Proper bike gloves in the smallest size I could find. They're legit gloves, cool print. Kid loves them. She's got small hands for a 2yr old
customer_reviews.author: MichiganHathNoFury

customer_reviews.title: The small fits my two year old perfectly
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my two year old son and it fits him perfectly! He’s still learning how to put gloves on so it is a bit of work trying to get all his fingers in it, but once it’s on it works out great. I got the robot decorated version and he loves to pretend he has robot hands lol it’s adorable. I would definitely buy again when he outgrows it.
customer_reviews.author: Kanani

customer_reviews.title: Awesome colors and my son loves them!
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my 3yr old and he loves them. Gloves are a necessity for little riders since it protects their hands on wipe outs.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very nice gloves
customer_reviews.text: Great gloves they look really good and my son loves them... He is 6 and has a large and they are tight.. gonna have to order an XL buy he is a bit tall for his age
customer_reviews.author: Thomas C. Bowlby

customer_reviews.title: Fits securely and provides good hands protection for young kids
customer_reviews.text: Sturdy and nice looking. My 4 year old likes it a lot. It provides good protection for his hands, fits snugly and securely. The robot patterns are a nice touch also. Bit expensive though for a pair of gloves.
customer_reviews.author: garunner

customer_reviews.title: Great Gloves
customer_reviews.text: These gloves are great, fit my 3y.o. perfectly. Holding up well, definitely recommend and will buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Saphrin

customer_reviews.title: Fit the smallest hands!
customer_reviews.text: These gloves were exactly what we were looking for. They fit the tiniest hands and make our little guy feel like he's a cool biker like his Mom and Dad. Good protection for the inevitable spills.
customer_reviews.author: Alison Kirk-Owen

customer_reviews.title: AWESOME little gloves for kids
customer_reviews.text: AWESOME little gloves for kids! It's hard to find gear like this for littles that fits properly. As an avid biker myself, I was so impressed with the quality and fit of the ZippyRooz! It's like a real bike glove- just Mini size!!! My son is 3 and a half and the suze Med is perfect. I would just suggest more color/pattern options ;)
customer_reviews.author: melanie garcia

customer_reviews.title: These are great quality gloves and fit my 18mo old perfectly
customer_reviews.text: These are great quality gloves and fit my 18mo old perfectly. I just have a hard time getting his fingers in the right holes. I guess that was to be expected as he rarely stays still.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: These are awesome! They are really hard to get on my son’s hands but I guess that’s to be expected. They are supposed to fit snug. He loves them and we love the grip and protection they provide. Awesome product!
customer_reviews.author: A. Collins

customer_reviews.title: We love them. We got the Large (5/6) and my ...
customer_reviews.text: They fit tiny hands perfectly! We love them. We got the Large (5/6) and my guy is 6 and slender... they fit absolutely perfect.
customer_reviews.author: SAMSDoll

customer_reviews.title: Yes.
customer_reviews.text: These are amazing and introduced my 2 year old to wearing gloves before winter. Helpful during bike riding. Now He shreds. Thanks Zippy
customer_reviews.author: NC

customer_reviews.title: Follow the size chart and all should be Great
customer_reviews.text: According to the sizing chart , I did the same measuring and it turned out right on. Fits my daughters hands great . She is two and has worn them a few times and they seem to be holding up well enough
customer_reviews.author: Spencer J.

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Gloves
customer_reviews.text: Zippy is the perfect name for these gloves. My son loves them and has to wear them whenever he gets on his bike. I would highly recommend these. Order a size up if you want them to last as they are a perfect fit to size as the guide measures.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great gloves!
customer_reviews.text: These gloves work great! They are well built, fit my 4yo girl perfect, and she loved the graphics and colors. They've already done their job a couple of times on her dirt bike.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Two thumbs up!
customer_reviews.text: My 4 year old grandson loves the gloves and won’t take them off. The quality is excellent and when he wears these out I will be purchasing more.
customer_reviews.author: Gina

customer_reviews.title: These are a little more pink than I was expecting ...
customer_reviews.text: These are a little more pink than I was expecting. My son is two and has no interest in putting them on. I should have thought about that before ordering.
customer_reviews.author: SkiBug

customer_reviews.title: Great kids glove
customer_reviews.text: These gloves were just what we were looking for! They are real, functional cycling gloves that are cute too. They have a padded palm and grips on the braking fingers. Perfect for my 6 year old daughter.
customer_reviews.author: LB

customer_reviews.title: they fit her little hands
customer_reviews.text: These are great searched high and low for leather gloves for a 3 year old If that is what you need you found them. she liked them so much I ordered another pair to keep with her 4 Wheeler and helmet
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Gloves
customer_reviews.text: Great gloves for my daughter to use with her wheelchair.
customer_reviews.author: A. M.

customer_reviews.title: Well build but it runs small. I bought a ...
customer_reviews.text: Well build but it runs small. I bought a large for a 4 years old kid and it fit tight.
customer_reviews.author: Laurindo A.

customer_reviews.title: FIT MY 4 YR OLD
customer_reviews.text: These gloves are super cute and fit my 4 yr old wonderfully. He has taken a couple falls with them and they have protected his hands.
customer_reviews.author: steleon

customer_reviews.title: ... three year loves these for his bike and fit perfect. Well made
customer_reviews.text: My three year loves these for his bike and fit perfect. Well made.
customer_reviews.author: Skeptical

customer_reviews.title: Awsome gloves
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for my grandson for mountain biking with me and he loves them, fit was dead on and looked good. He felt like one of guys. Thanks
customer_reviews.author: jose

customer_reviews.title: size runs large
customer_reviews.text: Sized according to chart. The fingers are really long. He will grow into them! He does like them. They are a bit pricey for what they are.
customer_reviews.author: GRANT PARRA

customer_reviews.title: Size chart was accurate
customer_reviews.text: Loved these gloves. Used size chart and gloves fit my child perfectly!
customer_reviews.author: Donna

customer_reviews.title: Run Small
customer_reviews.text: Nice gloves for child but sizing is so vague that it's hard to get the right thing.
customer_reviews.author: Sound Advisor

customer_reviews.title: Not what I expected
customer_reviews.text: Not waterproof as stated. Cheap material. Not worth nearly $20.
customer_reviews.author: Kristinhunt1294

customer_reviews.title: fit well
customer_reviews.text: My grandchildren adore these gloves. We measured according to the chart and they fit perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: tea drinker

customer_reviews.title: They look very cool and have great quality
customer_reviews.text: Small size fitted just perfect on my 3 years old rider, just ordered a new pair Medium cause he is gonna change soon
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: reasonable child's gloves
customer_reviews.text: The gloves fit as expected though they are not quite as thick as an adult version and leave my daughter's fingers cold. She really likes the pattern though.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love them
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my 2 yr old grandson. Was not disappointed. He loves them!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Hohman

customer_reviews.title: Little Kids Full Long Finger Bike Gloves: Large (5-6)
customer_reviews.text: Spectacular product, as described, great quality and finish. I bought large size (5-6) for my 4 year old son, it got a little big, but you can use it without problems. Highly recommend the purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Mauro Disner Girardi

customer_reviews.title: Easy to put on and fit perfectly.
customer_reviews.text: My 3 year old loves them. They fit her very well and are perfect for the winter. They are a bit thin, so don't wear them outside in the cold for long periods of time.
customer_reviews.author: Dominic

customer_reviews.title: Up size gloves
customer_reviews.text: The quality of the gloves are great. I had to return for the next size up because my son is bigger than most kids his age. Great rating, for great gloves. Highly recommend
customer_reviews.author: Jon G

customer_reviews.title: The BEST little gloves I've ever seen!!
customer_reviews.text: I got these little gloves for my 5 year old grandson and can not wait to give them to him for Christmas! They seem like great quality. Very cute!!
customer_reviews.author: Crazy4kids

customer_reviews.title: Great feel!
customer_reviews.text: They work great! They are a little big for our 13 month old but we planned it that way so he will grow into them. He loves them and we have been outside multiple times with his new gloves.
customer_reviews.author: Rodney E.

customer_reviews.title: Difficult to use
customer_reviews.text: Super cute but absolutely impossible to put on sticky little toddler fingers. I returned these and got the half finger gloves, which my nephew loves and are much easier to manhandle him into.
customer_reviews.author: Lindsay

customer_reviews.title: Perfect gloves for little riders
customer_reviews.text: Great gloves for riding a stride bike - my 2 year old loves them!
customer_reviews.author: Bmore Raven

customer_reviews.title: Great little gloves.
customer_reviews.text: My son is so stoked he won't take them off :)
customer_reviews.author: Fry

customer_reviews.title: Awesome toddler gloves!!
customer_reviews.text: These gloves are awesome!!! I bought 2 mediums for my 3 & 4 year old and they love them! Great quality will definitely buy again!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Pricy!!
customer_reviews.text: Cute gloves bit a bit thin. My grandson refused to wear them.
customer_reviews.author: David Glines

customer_reviews.title: Great gloves
customer_reviews.text: These fit my son perfect! He uses them daily for riding his bike. Easy to put on and washable.
customer_reviews.author: Andrea

customer_reviews.title: Cute but hard to get on
customer_reviews.text: These little gloves are well made and too cute: problem with a two-year old is working fingers into the gloves: we did much better with the open finger design.
customer_reviews.author: Genre Fan

customer_reviews.title: Kids gloves are perfect. The size is exactly what we went by ...
customer_reviews.text: Kids gloves are perfect. The size is exactly what we went by on the order site. Go by the age group like they suggested.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Really good cover and grip for kids to ride a bicycle/scooter ...
customer_reviews.text: Really good cover and grip for kids to ride a bicycle/scooter etc. Bought the Large for my 6 year old tall daughter
customer_reviews.author: Mahima Hada

customer_reviews.title: Awesome product
customer_reviews.text: We purchased the XL size for our 7 year old. The quality is outstanding and he feels like the real deal. Would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Keith Lake

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Best kids bike gloves on the planet. Perfect fit for our 2 year old.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with these for my 3 yr old. Went with size medium and they fit great.
customer_reviews.author: Lynn Matlock

customer_reviews.title: Great find!
customer_reviews.text: These will be a gift for my son along with his first dirt bike. They look perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Ttree003

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Cute gloves but the size we ordered were too small for our child. They were really cute!
customer_reviews.author: niles

customer_reviews.title: We ordered medium for my soon to be 3 year ...
customer_reviews.text: We ordered medium for my soon to be 3 year old. They fit perfectly with a little room to grow :) he uses them for riding his bike & dirt bike!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: HATE RETURNING THINGS
customer_reviews.text: SAID LARGE AND THE GLOVES DONT!!!! FIT MY FIVE YEAR OLD SON😡😡😡 SO UPSETTING. HATE RETURNING THINGS. 👎🏻👎🏻👎🏻👎🏻👎🏻👎🏻👎🏻👎🏻👎🏻👎🏻👎🏻👎🏻👎🏻
customer_reviews.author: HEIDY F.

product_meta.title: ZippyRooz Toddler & Little Kids Full Long Finger Bike Gloves
feature_bullets: 💥 WARNING: Wearing these gloves may give your little ones SuperHero Powers!
💥 Sized for the smallest of Sports Action Heros, from 1 years old up to Children age 8
💥 Designed to keep your kids comfortable & protected while engaging in their favorite sport. Minimal padding on the palm for easier grip but still offers protection.
💥 Helps keep little fingers warm in cooler temperatures but still breathable enough for warmer days. Soft thumb material for wiping running noses.
💥 Ideal for multiple sports such as Riding Bicycles - Pedal & Balance Bikes, Skateboards, Scooters, Roller Skates, Roller Blades, Balance Boards, Gymnastics, Monkey Bars, etc
